message.modTARSNavigationUpdating: [TARS] Updating navigation system. This may take a few seconds.

ModTARSTars.name: TARS
ModTARSTars.dialogButtonAquireItemTooltip: Instruct TARS to acquire the selected item.
ModTARSTars.dialogButtonBuildDoodadTooltip: Instruct TARS to acquire the item for the selected doodad and build it.
ModTARSTars.dialogButtonTameCreatureTooltip: Instruct TARS to tame the selected creature.
ModTARSTars.dialogButtonSailToCivilizationTooltip: Instruct TARS to sail to civilization. It will acquire the necessary items to do so.
ModTARSTars.dialogButtonDebugLoggingTooltip:
Enables extra debug logging to the console
Warning: This may significally decrease performance.
ModTARSTars.dialogButtonExploreIslandsTooltip:
Allow TARS to explore other islands after it makes a base, equipment, and has enough resources for traveling.
Note: This has no effect when in a multiplayer game.
ModTARSTars.dialogButtonQuantumBurstTooltip:
Allow TARS to harness the power of interdimensional energy allowing for quantum computating.
Warning: The cooldown after disabling this is directly proportional to the time active
Note: This has no effect when in a multiplayer game.
ModTARSTars.dialogButtonStayHealthyTooltip: Allow TARS to recover health, stamina, hunger, and thirst when necessary.
ModTARSTars.dialogButtonGoodCitizenTooltip: Instruct TARS to not take items from other players chests when in a multiplayer game.
ModTARSTars.dialogButtonUseOrbsOfInfluenceTooltip: Allow TARS to use Orbs of Influence when necessary.
ModTARSTars.dialogButtonDisallowProtectedItemsToolti: Prevents TARS from using Protected Items (with the exception of it's equipped Sword & Shield).
ModTARSTars.dialogButtonAllowProtectedItemsTooltip: Allow TARS to use all Protected Items.
ModTARSTars.dialogButtonAllowProtectedItemsWithBreak: Allow Protected Items if they won't break

Allow TARS to use Protected Items, while preventing the items from breaking.
TARS will not use Protected Items when the durability is too low.
ModTARSTars.dialogModeGardenerTooltip: TARS will gather seeds and plant them to make a garden.
ModTARSTars.dialogModeHarvesterTooltip:
TARS will go around harvesting materials from nature.
Note: It will keep harvesting until there is nothing harvestable left in the world.
ModTARSTars.dialogModeSurvivalTooltip: TARS will setup a camp, gather resources, build equipment, stay healthy, and survive.
ModTARSTars.dialogModeTidyUpTooltip: TARS will tidy up items around the base by building & moving items into chests.
ModTARSTars.dialogModeTerminatorTooltip:
TARS will go around terminating hostile wildlife.
Note: It's recommended to only use this mode when TARS has decent equipment!
ModTARSTars.dialogModeQuestTooltip:
TARS will work on completing quests.
Note: TARS only knows how to complete certain quests, such as the ones in the "Starter Quest" mod.
ModTARSTars.dialogRangeRecoverHealthThresholdTooltip: TARS will recover health once it hits this value.
ModTARSTars.dialogRangeRecoverHungerThresholdTooltip: TARS will recover hunger once it hits this value.
ModTARSTars.dialogRangeRecoverStaminaThresholdToolti: TARS will recover stamina once it hits this value.
ModTARSTars.dialogRangeRecoverThirstThresholdTooltip: TARS will recover thirst once it hits this value.
